message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1450000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $1300000 is closer to my bottom line, I'm still not quite there.  How about $1350000?  That leaves some room for both of us to be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1300000, but no higher. Can you meet me there?
